labels.value: Back to Sales Certification home page
The till reported Net Sales exclusive of VAT
You are choosing to submit the Sales Certification data for this certification period. The data you are submitting should be excluding VAT.

This platform is subject to contractual obligations and confidentiality, and should only be used by the personnel expressly authorised. By selecting Submit and OK you are confirming that you are an authorised person.
You have successfully submitted your Certified Sales
The certified amount (Total Net Sales + Total Net VIP/Staff Discounts)
The till reported Net Sales exclusive of VAT
Total Net value of VIP and Staff discounts excluding VAT
NET SALES & NET DISCOUNTS EXCLUDING VAT
The file must not be greater than 1 MB!
The Certified Amount cannot be blank unless the store is closed for that date. Either enter a value for the Certified Amount or mark the store as closed.

There is significant variance between the original Brand Reported Sales amount and the Certified Sales amount. Please provide an overall comment to explain the variance in the overall comment box on this page before you submit.
Please ensure you make a change to the sales certification data or add an overall comment
Enter an overall comment to explain any variances
Your CSV file is not using the correct format. Please use a comma (,) or semicolon (;) to separate the columns of data.
The Store reported amount (Total Net Sales + Total Net VIP/Staff Discounts)
Something went wrong. Please notify your village contact.
Mark as Store Closed if the store was not trading
You need to save or cancel any changes before you can submit

Click the link to Upload the Sales Data.  Please note that:
- The maximum file size you can upload is 1 MB.
- The system does not accept commas in the file cells, please use dots to indicate decimals in numbers.
Total Net value of VIP and Staff discounts excluding VAT
Variance between the Certified Amount and the Reported Amount
Daily Sales records in the past 3 months
Only records that are valid for confirmation will be displayed
You will only see records that you have authority to confirm
Please contact your Retail Manager if you have any questions or issues.

There are unconfirmed Daily Sale records for your store, please confirm these records as soon as convenient.
Should you require support, contact your village retail team coordinator.
Contact is not a valid user

Please save to confirm that you have read and understood the terms

Contact User has been successfully enabled
Contact is currently not an Active User
Contact is not currently a valid user. Please select the Enable Customer User option if you wish to provide portal access to this contact.
Welcome to the Value Retail Brand Community
You have been activated as a user in the Value Retail Brand Community. To set up a password please go to
Once you have set a password you will be logged into the Brand Community. We recommend that you bookmark the website
You will need your username and password to login next time. Make a note of your username for future reference. Username:
The Current Season Bestsellers Sales cannot be higher than the Total Net Sales. The Total Net Sales should include all sales for the day.
The Current Season Bestsellers Units cannot be higher than the total Units Sold for the day.
Number of covers cannot be less than the number of transactions. Please set the 'Ignore Validations' flag and add a note to this record if you believe the values are correct.
Footfall cannot be higher than the total Units Sold for the day.
If Ignore Validations selected, please confirm why, or add any other notes you believe are required

labels.shortDescription: KPIFlow HelpText Brand Private Appointment Sales
labels.value: Enter the amount of Brand Private Appointment sales, if there were no sales for the day enter 0.

labels.shortDescription: KPIFlow HelpText Brand Private Appointment Units
labels.value: Enter the amount of Brand Private Appointment units, if there were no units sold for the day enter 0.

labels.shortDescription: KPIFlow HelpText Brand Private Appointment transactions
labels.value: Enter the amount of Brand Private Appointment transactions, if there were no transactions for the day enter 0.

labels.shortDescription: KPIFlow HelpText Brand Virtual Shopping Sales
labels.value: Enter the amount of Brand Virtual Shopping sales, if there were no sales for the day enter 0.

labels.shortDescription: KPIFlow HelpText Brand Virtual Shopping Transactions
labels.value: Enter the amount of Brand Virtual Shopping transactions, if there were no transactions for the day enter 0.

labels.shortDescription: KPIFlow HelpText Brand Virtual Shopping Units
labels.value: Enter the amount of Brand Virtual Shopping units, if there were no units sold for the day enter 0.
Enter the amount of Current Season Bestseller sales. This is full price product from current season collection. If there were no full price sales for this day enter 0.
Enter the number of Current Season Bestseller units. This is full price product from current season collection. If there were no full price units sold for this day enter 0.
Enter the figure from the footfall counter. Please leave blank if you do not have a footfall counter or do not yet know the value.
If when you try and save this record you get validation errors but believe the data to be correct, please tick this checkbox and complete the notes field with the reason.

Enter the amount of Special Curated Selection sales, if there were no sales for the day enter 0. This is product recently discontinued at full price but not yet available at off-price. Product for TBVSC at a 10% discount off RRP.

Enter the number of Special Curated Selection units, if there were not units sold for the day enter 0. This is product recently discontinued at full price but not yet available at off-price. Product for TBVSC at a 10% discount off RRP.
Select to indicate the store was closed on the trading date

labels.shortDescription: KPIFlow HelpText Tax Free Sales Amount

labels.value: This is the total sales for the day including all types of sales (e.g. Special Curated Selection Sales, Current Season Bestsellers Sales)
Number of transactions with a VIP card scanned
Please enter a note in the notes field if you wish to ignore validations

labels.shortDescription: KPIFlow Label NET Value of Discounts
KPIFlow Label Tax Free Sales Amount

labels.value: The Net Value of Discounts amount cannot be greater than the total net sales. Please set the 'Ignore Validations' flag and add a note to this record if you believe the values are correct.
Number of VIP cards should not be greater than the number of transactions. Please set the 'Ignore Validations' flag and add a note to this record if you believe the values are correct.
Number of VIP cards should not be greater than the number of units sold. Please set the 'Ignore Validations' flag and add a note to this record if you believe the values are correct.

The number of transactions should not be greater than the total NET sales. Please check your figures. Please set the 'Ignore Validations' flag and add a note to this record if you believe the values are correct.
The number of transactions cannot be greater than the units sold. Please set the 'Ignore Validations' flag and add a note to this record if you believe the values are correct.
The Brand Private Appointment Sales cannot be higher than the Total Net Sales. The Total Net Sales should include all sales for the day.
The Brand Private Appointment Units cannot be higher than the total Units Sold for the day.
The Brand Private Appointment Transactions cannot be higher than the total number of transactions for the day.

The Tax free Sales Amount cannot be greater than the Brand Reported Amount. Please check your figures. Please set the 'Ignore Validations' flag and add a note to this record if you believe the values are correct.

The number of Tax Free Transactions cannot be greater than the number of transactions. Please check your figures. Please set the 'Ignore Validations' flag and add a note to this record if you believe the values are correct.
The Special Curated Selection Sales cannot be higher than the Total Net Sales. The Total Net Sales should include all sales for the day.
The Special Curated Selection Units cannot be higher than the total Units Sold for the day.
Sales cannot be higher than the Total Net Sales. The Total Net Sales should include all sales for the day.

Store has been recorded as closed and therefore cannot have any sales figures entered. If the Store has been wrongly marked as closed, please remove the store closed flag. If the store is closed, please ensure no sales figures have been entered.
You have entered a very large Sales figure, please verify the values entered. Please set the 'Ignore Validations' flag and add a note to this record if you believe the values are correct.
Transactions cannot be higher than the total Transactions.
Units cannot be higher than the total Units Sold.
The Brand Virtual Shopping Sales cannot be higher than the Total Net Sales. The Total Net Sales should include all sales for the day.
The Brand Virtual Shopping Units cannot be higher than the total Units Sold for the day.
The Brand Virtual Shopping Transactions cannot be higher than the total number of transactions for the day.

The number of transactions should not be greater than the footfall. Also the footfall should not be zero. Please set the 'Ignore Validations' flag and add a note to this record if you believe the values are correct.
There are no valid records you have authority to confirm at this present time
There are no Master Budget Sheets available for selection
There are no Master Budget Sheet Items available for selection
You must select at least one Master Budget Sheet Item
Please select the Media Agency Access To Salesforce
